articles.title: Zelenskiy warns of 'ugly' Russian attack before Ukraine Independence Day - Reuters
articles.description: President Volodymyr Zelenskiy urged vigilance ahead of Wednesday's celebrations of 31 years of Ukraine's independence from Soviet rule, as shells rained down near Europe's biggest nuclear plant and Russian forces struck in the south and east.
articles.content: Aug 21 (Reuters) - President Volodymyr Zelenskiy urged vigilance ahead of Wednesday's celebrations of 31 years of Ukraine's independence from Soviet rule, as shells rained down near Europe's biggest … [+5150 chars]

articles.title: Nina: ‘Nigerian’ out to stop Falconets - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: Before the 2022 U-20 Women’s World Cup, many outside the shores of The Netherlands had not heard the name Nina Iyobosa Nijstad, and understandably so, as the 19-year-old was not a popular name in Europe’s women football.

articles.title: Russia's Gazprom says key gas pipeline to Europe will shut down for 'routine maintenance' - CBC News

articles.title: Hunger stones, wrecks and bones: Europe's drought brings past to surface - The Guardian
articles.description: Receding rivers and lakes have exposed ghost villages, a Nazi vehicle and a Roman fort
